728656f-a.title: Richmond: Castleton Avenue - Bard Avenue
728656f-a.text:
Castleton Avenue, north side, from Bard to Eissel
Avenues, showing the old building of St. Vincents Hospi-
tal. It was at one time (1874 map) the W. T. Garner
mansion and later (1898 map) the St. Austin Protestant
Episcopal School for Boys.
About 1910
Biy Mulford Simonson
From P. M. Sperr Collection
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
The same, years later.
May 1, 1931
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(3)
An additional view.
October 26, 1931
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
728656f-a.folder: Castleton Avenue & Bard Avenue, Staten Island, NY

728472f-a.title: Richmond: Bard Avenue - Castleton Avenue
728472f-a.text:
443 Bard Ave., east side, between Castleton and Delafield Aves.
(at the head of Dekay Street), showing the residence of Dr. Charles
Stiles.
1925.
P. L. Sperr.
